nodes.text: Starmer was a Human farmer during the Clone Wars.

Starmer, along with Hurm and two other men infiltrated an ark starship (designated to carry farm animals to terraformed worlds) with the intention of taking over the ship to transport the animals to Starmer's homeworld, which had petitioned the Galactic Republic months earlier for the receival of farm creatures as well, but got no reply.

Unbeknownst to them, the ship was being manned by Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, who effectively foiled their plans and imprisoned them. Upon the arrival on one of the terraformed worlds, Tano instead of arresting them, gave them newborn animals for them to breed and take back to their home planet.

Starmer had a more aggressive nature if compared to Hurm, who was initially reluctant to engage in a fight with Ahsoka, as Starmer preferred a more direct way of resolving their planet's farm animal shortage.
